    policy_id="nightly-snapshots",
    schedule="0 30 2 * * ?",
    name="<nightly-snap-{now/d}>",
    repository="my_repository",
    config={
        "include_global_state": False,
        "indices": "*"
    },
    retention={
        "expire_after": "30d",
        "min_count": 5,
        "max_count": 50
    },
)
print(resp)
